title: Handwriting Recognition with Tensorflow
description: Using the NIST Dataset 19 and Google's Tensorflow Library for Python, I made a very primitive convolutional neural network to recognize single handwritten letters.

title: Feed Forward Neural Network in C#
description: Using C#/.NET I implemented a primitive feed forward neural network with a basic backpropagation algorithm. It works only very slowly and the optimizer is very bad to say the least.

title: Common Misconceptions
description: Using Python Flask and the article 'List of common misconceptions' on Wikipedia, I made a simple website which outputs a random bullet point from that article.

title: This portfolio
description: Using Python Flask I made a simple websites which reads in portfolio entries from a JSON File and displays them.

title: VUBA
description: During Jugend Hackt 2019 [German Link] in Cologne, I majorly contributed to the frontend and partially contributed to the backend of VUBA, a webapp which combines many different bike sharing providers into one progressive web app.

title: Constantine Discord Bot
description: Using Python and the discord.py API Wrapper for Discord, I made a multifunctional bot for the messaging platform Discord. It supports news articles, stocks, wikipedia and more.

title: Testprojekt
description: Hallo dies ist ein Test Projekt.

title: ..and (probably) more.
description: There are some projects that I did not mention here which I contributed to, so if you want to learn more feel free to checkout my GitHub Profile.
